snippet: Fiat says its merger with Chrysler is going ahead since there isn’t enough opposition to derail it.
abstract: Fiat announces that merger with Chrysler will proceed, saying shareholder opposition was insufficient to derail it.
lead_paragraph: Fiat says its merger with Chrysler is going ahead since there isn’t enough opposition to derail it.

headline.main: Fiat Moving Along With Chrysler Merger
headline.print_headline: Fiat Moving Along With Chrysler Merger
